div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1465 Asia Minor, c. 1840-5 (72) Burial: 30-25 B.C. (M) Contents: c. 500 AR Side: c. 11+ tetradr. Amyntas of Galatia: c. 16+ tetradr. Disposition: Sotheby, July 12, 1852, 254-61 and probably 359-66 de Luynes, RN 1845, pp. 261-5, illus. Burgon, NC 1845-6, pp. 69 ff., illus. Hoffmann, Le numismate 1862-4, nos. 2532-4 Bunbury, NC 1883, p. 199, note 21
